manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Attractive and Effective Lamp Background or centerpiece lighting to set the mood or provide bright & practical illumination. Light up a room with calming warm white light or gorgeous color.

Convenient Touch Control Illuminate your room with a gentle tap on the touch-sensitive base. Get your lighting right, whether reading or relaxing, with 3 modes to choose from– soft glow, ambient warmth, and bright light. A simple and elegant design to complement your home or office.

Mood-Enhancing Color Delight family & friends with a stunning, vibrant, dynamic display spanning the 256-RGB-color spectrum– Red, orange, yellow, green, blue, violet and everything in-between. Or pick and pause on your perfect color.

Eye-Safe Comfortable, rich, warm light on every setting. No eye-harming glare. Energy-efficient LED technology saves you money and minimizes environmental impacts. Enjoy bright and colorful mood lighting that’s eye-safe and energy-efficient.

What do I have? The dimmable 3 levels brightness meets all the daily needs for lighting, for example, reading, night light, baby nursery and etc. 360° touch control sensitive base, simple and take a little space for the bedroom RGB color cycling, mood light, choose your favorite color for dinner dating, gaming room decoration, or else. Is it a cordless table lamp? No, it comes with an AC adapter, it has to be plugged into the power socket to work. Can we adjust the RGB color brightness? I am sorry that the lamp for now only supports RGB Color cycling or simply touch to choose your desired color, if you want the adjust the RGB color brightness, we could recommend you to choose our Hifree touch bedside lamp (ASIN: B09H7GCJZB) Is the lamp convenient to control? Yes, only softy simple touch the lamp base once to control the lamp's brightness, and when the lamp is on RGB mode, tap the 360° touch control sensitive base once to lock your favorite color What my brand can offer? All Hifree products were offered lifetime quality protection, if you have any questions, we would like to you contact our customers support (find on our product user manual or package), we will respond in less than 12 hours and provide an extraordinary experience to our customers. Do I need to change the bulb？ NO, it is a LED desk lamp, so you do not need to change any bulb. The LED lifespan is over 35,000 hours, it is enough for almost 10 years of daily use. Meanwhile, all products quality problems will only send a free replacement without asking questions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bedside lamp
reviews.reviewText: This lamp was great for my purpose. I wanted a lamp that wouldn't take up too much space or be too bright. I originally wanted it as a lamp for reading in bed however I love that I can adjust the brightness especially since I get up for work before the sun. The lowest setting gives just enough light to see around my room without being overpowering so early in the morning. I don't really use the changing colors function but it is a plus and easy to do if desired.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect size for my bedroom. It isn’t huge or awkward. You can choose lighting color and brightness with a touch of your finger. My cat loves it at 3:00 a.m.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and At Times Annoying
reviews.reviewText: It is not super bright, but that did not bother me. I like its size and the fact that it has no parts that can break or get lost. The light feels very warm. I wanted a light that could gently illuminate my face during winter Zoom sessions and was not dissapointed. But the on/off /mode sensor... was a different story. It works when it works. I got scientific and tested it using the same finger in the same position. I had 75% success rate getting it to turn on. Once it is on, it is not hard to turn up the intensity. The color mode will appear if you touch any part of the lamp while it is on. This defeats its portability because who will want to move the lamp, if it is hard to turn it on or off? In short, a good lamp if you like changing colors and if you don't mind fussing with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolute Best Buy out there.
reviews.reviewText: I was very skeptical at first…the functions seemed good and the 3 brightness levels are much more than adequate and actually quite impressive for their size! Bought one for each side of a King…the lowest level of the light almost gives the ambiance of candlelight!You can’t for wrong here!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for elderly.
reviews.reviewText: Single touch to raise brightness. Easy to use.Good range from low to bright light

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lamp works fine - however the light it provides is quite harsh
reviews.reviewText: Wanted to write this review to highlight that the lamp itself works fine but with one fatal flaw.Positives: - I like that there is a little tiny indicator light on the front so it's easy to find the touch-point base in a dark room.- In general it does its job as advertised -- no quality control issuesI've been using this lamp for about 4 months in my bedroom on the nightstand. The only negative about this lamp is the light it gives off -- it's quite harsh. Just imagine a normal lamp that has no lampshade right in your face while you're lying in bed. Admittedly I think I have an undiagnosed light-sensitivity issue, but I just couldn't take it anymore. This thing is different than my old traditional non-touch lamp that I used to have -- and obviously anything that's different requires a certain period of time to get used to. But yeah I just couldn't live with this thing anymore. I ended up getting another touch lamp, but one with a lamp shade included and it makes all the difference.So just be warned. If you have any light-sensitivity issues, you're not going to like this lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use. Beautiful illumination.
reviews.reviewText: Great RBG lamp to set the vibe for the night weather you're watching a movie, gaming or just chilling out. The regular light has 3 levels of brightness at are appropriate for any lightning need. Using one in a medium sized bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
